original: Majjhima Nikāya 87
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Piyajātikasutta
analyzed: piya jātika sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa gahapatissa ekaputtako piyo manāpo kālaṅkato hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa gahapatissa eka puttakaḥ piyaḥ manāpaḥ kālaṅkataḥ hoti

original: Tassa kālaṅkiriyāya neva kammantā paṭibhanti na bhattaṁ paṭibhāti.
analyzed: tassa kālaṅkiriyāya na iva kammantāḥ paṭibhanti na bhattam paṭibhāti

original: So āḷāhanaṁ gantvā kandati:
analyzed: saḥ u āḷāhanam gantvā kandati

original: “kahaṁ, ekaputtaka, kahaṁ, ekaputtakā”ti.
analyzed: ekaputtaka ekaputtaka ati

original: Atha kho so gahapati yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho taṁ gahapatiṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu saḥ gahapati yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnam khalu tam gahapatim bhagavān etat avoca

original: “na kho te, gahapati, sake citte ṭhitassa indriyāni, atthi te indriyānaṁ aññathattan”ti.
analyzed: na kho te gahapati sake citte ṭhitassa indriyāni atthi te indriyānaṃ aññathattanti

original: “Kiñhi me, bhante, indriyānaṁ nāññathattaṁ bhavissati;
analyzed: kim hi me bhante indriyānam na aññathattam bhavissati

original: mayhañhi, bhante, ekaputto piyo manāpo kālaṅkato.
analyzed: mayhan hi bhante eka puttaḥ piyaḥ manāpaḥ kālaṅkataḥ

original: Tassa kālaṅkiriyāya neva kammantā paṭibhanti, na bhattaṁ paṭibhāti.
analyzed: tassa kālaṅkiriyāya na iva kammantāḥ paṭibhanti na bhattam paṭibhāti

original: Sohaṁ āḷāhanaṁ gantvā kandāmi:
analyzed: saḥ aham āḷāhanam gantvā kandāmi

original: ‘kahaṁ, ekaputtaka, kahaṁ, ekaputtakā’”ti.
analyzed: ekaputtaka ekaputtaka ati

original: “Evametaṁ, gahapati, evametaṁ, gahapati.
analyzed: evam eta gahapati evam eta gahapati

original: Piyajātikā hi, gahapati, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā”ti.
analyzed: piya jātikā hi gahapati soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: “Kassa kho nāmetaṁ, bhante, evaṁ bhavissati:
analyzed: kassa kho nāma ita bhante evam bhavissati

original: ‘piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā’ti?
analyzed: piya jātikā soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: Piyajātikā hi kho, bhante, ānandasomanassā piyappabhavikā”ti.
analyzed: piya jātikā hi kho bhante ānanda somanassā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: Atha kho so gahapati bhagavato bhāsitaṁ anabhinanditvā paṭikkositvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ gahapati bhagavataḥ bhāsitam an abhinanditvā paṭikkositvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkāmi

original: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā akkhadhuttā bhagavato avidūre akkhehi dibbanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sambahulāḥ akkha dhuttāḥ bhagavataḥ avidūre akkhehi dibbanti

original: Atha kho so gahapati yena te akkhadhuttā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā akkhadhutte etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho saḥ gahapati yena te akkhadhuttā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā akkhadhutte etat avoca

original: “idhāhaṁ, bhonto, yena samaṇo gotamo tenupasaṅkamiṁ; upasaṅkamitvā samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁ. Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho maṁ, bhonto, samaṇo gotamo etadavoca:
analyzed: idha āha bhontaḥ yena samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā samaṇam gotamam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnam khalu ma bhontaḥ samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ etat avoca

original: ‘na kho te, gahapati, sake citte ṭhitassa indriyāni, atthi te indriyānaṁ aññathattan’ti.
analyzed: na kho te gahapati sake citte ṭhitassa indriyāni atthi te indriyānaṃ aññathattanti

original: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhonto, samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte aha bhontaḥ samaṇam gotamam etat avoca

original: ‘kiñhi me, bhante, indriyānaṁ nāññathattaṁ bhavissati;
analyzed: kim hi me bhante indriyānam na aññathattam bhavissati

original: mayhañhi, bhante, ekaputtako piyo manāpo kālaṅkato.
analyzed: mayhan hi bhante eka puttakaḥ piyaḥ manāpaḥ kālaṅkataḥ

original: Tassa kālaṅkiriyāya neva kammantā paṭibhanti, na bhattaṁ paṭibhāti.
analyzed: tassa kālaṅkiriyāya na iva kammantāḥ paṭibhanti na bhattam paṭibhāti

original: Sohaṁ āḷāhanaṁ gantvā kandāmi—
analyzed: saḥ aham āḷāhanam gantvā kandāmi

original: kahaṁ, ekaputtaka, kahaṁ, ekaputtakā’ti.
analyzed: ekaputtaka ekaputtaka ati

original: ‘Evametaṁ, gahapati, evametaṁ, gahapati.
analyzed: evam eta gahapati evam eta gahapati

original: Piyajātikā hi, gahapati, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā’ti.
analyzed: piya jātikā hi gahapati soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: ‘Kassa kho nāmetaṁ, bhante, evaṁ bhavissati—
analyzed: kassa kho nāma ita bhante evam bhavissati

original: piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā?
analyzed: piya jātikā soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā

original: Piyajātikā hi kho, bhante, ānandasomanassā piyappabhavikā’ti.
analyzed: piya jātikā hi kho bhante ānanda somanassā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: Atha khvāhaṁ, bhonto, samaṇassa gotamassa bhāsitaṁ anabhinanditvā paṭikkositvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamin”ti.
analyzed: atha khvā āha bhonto samaṇassa gotamassa bhāsitam an abhinanditvā paṭikkositvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkaminti

original: “Evametaṁ, gahapati, evametaṁ, gahapati.
analyzed: evam eta gahapati evam eta gahapati

original: Piyajātikā hi, gahapati, ānandasomanassā piyappabhavikā”ti.
analyzed: piya jātikā hi gahapati ānanda somanassā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: Atha kho so gahapati “sameti me akkhadhuttehī”ti pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho saḥ gahapati sameti me akkhadhuttehi iti pakkāmi

original: Atha kho idaṁ kathāvatthu anupubbena rājantepuraṁ pāvisi.
analyzed: atha kho idam kathā vatthu anupubbena rājantepuram pāvisi

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo mallikaṁ deviṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ mallikam devim āmantesi

original: “idaṁ te, mallike, samaṇena gotamena bhāsitaṁ:
analyzed: idam te mallike samaṇena gotamena bhāsita

original: ‘piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā’”ti.
analyzed: piya jātikā soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: “Sacetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ, evametan”ti.
analyzed: saceta mahā rāja bhagavatā bhāsitaḥ evam etat ti

original: “Evameva panāyaṁ mallikā yaññadeva samaṇo gotamo bhāsati taṁ tadevassa abbhanumodati:
analyzed: evam eva pana ayam mallikā yaññat eva samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ bhāsati tam tat evassa abbhanumodati

original: ‘Sacetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ evametan’ti.
analyzed: saceta mahā rāja bhagavatā bhāsitam evam etat iti

original: Seyyathāpi nāma, yaññadeva ācariyo antevāsissa bhāsati taṁ tadevassa antevāsī abbhanumodati:
analyzed: seyyathā api nāma yaññadevaḥ ācariyaḥ antevāsissa bhāsati tam tadevassa antevāsī abbhanumodati

original: ‘evametaṁ, ācariya, evametaṁ, ācariyā’ti.
analyzed: evam ete ācariyaḥ evam ete ācariyāti

original: Evameva kho tvaṁ, mallike, yaññadeva samaṇo gotamo bhāsati taṁ tadevassa abbhanumodasi:
analyzed: evam eva kho tva mallike yaññat eva samaṇaḥ gotamaḥ bhāsati tam tad evassa abbhanumodasi

original: ‘Sacetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā bhāsitaṁ evametan’ti.
analyzed: saceta mahā rāja bhagavatā bhāsitam evam etat iti

original: Cara pire, mallike, vinassā”ti.
analyzed: cara pire mallike vinassāti

original: Atha kho mallikā devī nāḷijaṅghaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu mallikā devī nāḷijaṅgham brāhmaṇam āmantesi

original: “ehi tvaṁ, brāhmaṇa, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkama; upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandāhi, appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ puccha:
analyzed: ehi tva brāhmaṇa yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkama upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandāhi appa ābādham appa ātaṅkam lahu ṭṭhānam balam phāsu vihāram puccha

original: ‘mallikā, bhante, devī bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati, appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ pucchatī’ti;
analyzed: mallikā bhante devī bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati appa ābādham appa ātaṅkam lahu ṭṭhānam balam phāsu vihāram pucchati iti

original: evañca vadehi:
analyzed: evañca vadehi

original: ‘bhāsitā nu kho, bhante, bhagavatā esā vācā—
analyzed: bhāsitā nu khalu bhante bhagavatā esā vācā

original: piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā’ti.
analyzed: piya jātikā soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: Yathā te bhagavā byākaroti taṁ sādhukaṁ uggahetvā mama āroceyyāsi.
analyzed: yathā te bhagavā byākaroti tam sādhukam uggahetvā mama āroceyyāsi

original: Na hi tathāgatā vitathaṁ bhaṇantī”ti.
analyzed: na hi tathāgatāḥ vitatham bhaṇanti iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhotī”ti kho nāḷijaṅgho brāhmaṇo mallikāya deviyā paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: eva bhoti iti kho nāḷijaṅghaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ mallikāya deviyā paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho nāḷijaṅgho brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu nāḷijaṅghaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “mallikā, bho gotama, devī bhoto gotamassa pāde sirasā vandati; appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ pucchati;
analyzed: mallikā bho gotama devī bhotaḥ gotamassa pāde sirasā vandati appa ābādham appa ātaṅkam lahu ṭṭhānam balam phāsu vihāram pucchati

original: evañca vadeti:
analyzed: evañca vada iti

original: ‘bhāsitā nu kho, bhante, bhagavatā esā vācā—
analyzed: bhāsitā nu khalu bhante bhagavatā esā vācā

original: piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā’”ti.
analyzed: piya jātikā soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: “Evametaṁ, brāhmaṇa, evametaṁ, brāhmaṇa.
analyzed: evam eta brāhmaṇa evam eta brāhmaṇa

original: Piyajātikā hi, brāhmaṇa, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikāti.
analyzed: piya jātikā hi brāhmaṇa soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: Tadamināpetaṁ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṁ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā.
analyzed: tat aminā apeta brāhmaṇa pariyāyena veditabbam yathā piya jātikā soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, brāhmaṇa, imissāyeva sāvatthiyā aññatarissā itthiyā mātā kālamakāsi.
analyzed: bhūta pubba brāhmaṇa imissāya eva sāvatthiyāḥ aññatarissā itthiyāḥ mātā kālam akāsi

original: Sā tassā kālakiriyāya ummattikā khittacittā rathikāya rathikaṁ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṁ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha:
analyzed: sā tassā kālakiriyāya ummattikā khitta cittā rathikāya rathikam siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakam upasaṅkamitvā evam āha

original: ‘api me mātaraṁ addassatha, api me mātaraṁ addassathā’ti?
analyzed: api me mātaram addassatha api me mātaram addassatha ati

original: Imināpi kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṁ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikāti.
analyzed: iminā api kho eta brāhmaṇa pariyāyena veditabbam yathā piya jātikā soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, brāhmaṇa, imissāyeva sāvatthiyā aññatarissā itthiyā pitā kālamakāsi …
analyzed: bhūta pubba brāhmaṇa imissāya eva sāvatthiyāḥ aññatarissā itthiyāḥ pitā kālam akāsi

original: bhātā kālamakāsi …
analyzed: bhātā kālam akāsi

original: bhaginī kālamakāsi …
analyzed: bhaginī kālam akāsi

original: putto kālamakāsi …
analyzed: putto kālam akāsi

original: dhītā kālamakāsi …
analyzed: dhītā kālam akāsi

original: sāmiko kālamakāsi.
analyzed: sāmikaḥ kālam akāsi

original: Sā tassa kālakiriyāya ummattikā khittacittā rathikāya rathikaṁ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṁ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha:
analyzed: sā tassa kāla kiriyāya ummattikā khitta cittā rathikāya rathikam siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakam upasaṅkamitvā evam āha

original: ‘api me sāmikaṁ addassatha, api me sāmikaṁ addassathā’ti?
analyzed: api me sāmikam addassatha api me sāmikam addassatha ati

original: Imināpi kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṁ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikāti.
analyzed: iminā api kho eta brāhmaṇa pariyāyena veditabbam yathā piya jātikā soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, brāhmaṇa, imissāyeva sāvatthiyā aññatarassa purisassa mātā kālamakāsi.
analyzed: bhūta pubba brāhmaṇa imissāya eva sāvatthiyā aññatarassa purisassa mātā kālam akāsi

original: So tassā kālakiriyāya ummattako khittacitto rathikāya rathikaṁ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṁ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha:
analyzed: saḥ tassā kālakiriyāya ummattakaḥ khitta cittaḥ rathikāya rathikam siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakam upasaṅkamitvā evam āha

original: ‘api me mātaraṁ addassatha, api me mātaraṁ addassathā’ti?
analyzed: api me mātaram addassatha api me mātaram addassatha ati

original: Imināpi kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṁ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikāti.
analyzed: iminā api kho eta brāhmaṇa pariyāyena veditabbam yathā piya jātikā soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, brāhmaṇa, imissāyeva sāvatthiyā aññatarassa purisassa pitā kālamakāsi …
analyzed: bhūta pubba brāhmaṇa imissāya eva sāvatthiyā aññatarassa purisassa pitā kālam akāsi

original: bhātā kālamakāsi …
analyzed: bhātā kālam akāsi

original: bhaginī kālamakāsi …
analyzed: bhaginī kālam akāsi

original: putto kālamakāsi …
analyzed: putto kālam akāsi

original: dhītā kālamakāsi …
analyzed: dhītā kālam akāsi

original: pajāpati kālamakāsi.
analyzed: pajāpati kālam akāsi

original: So tassā kālakiriyāya ummattako khittacitto rathikāya rathikaṁ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṁ upasaṅkamitvā evamāha:
analyzed: saḥ tassā kālakiriyāya ummattakaḥ khitta cittaḥ rathikāya rathikam siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakam upasaṅkamitvā evam āha

original: ‘api me pajāpatiṁ addassatha, api me pajāpatiṁ addassathā’ti?
analyzed: api me pajāpatim addassatha api me pajāpatim addassatha ati

original: Imināpi kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṁ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikāti.
analyzed: iminā api kho eta brāhmaṇa pariyāyena veditabbam yathā piya jātikā soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, brāhmaṇa, imissāyeva sāvatthiyā aññatarā itthī ñātikulaṁ agamāsi.
analyzed: bhūta pubba brāhmaṇa imissāya eva sāvatthiyāḥ aññatarā itthī ñāti kulam agamāsi

original: Tassā te ñātakā sāmikaṁ acchinditvā aññassa dātukāmā.
analyzed: tassā te ñātakā sāmikam a chinditvā aññassa dātu kāmā

original: Sā ca taṁ na icchati.
analyzed: sā ca tam naḥ icchati

original: Atha kho sā itthī sāmikaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu sā itthī sāmikam etat avoca

original: ‘ime, maṁ, ayyaputta, ñātakā tvaṁ acchinditvā aññassa dātukāmā.
analyzed: ime me ayya putta ñātakā tvam a chinditvā aññassa dātu kāmā

original: Ahañca taṁ na icchāmī’ti.
analyzed: aham ca tam naḥ icchāmi iti

original: Atha kho so puriso taṁ itthiṁ dvidhā chetvā attānaṁ upphālesi:
analyzed: atha kho saḥ purisaḥ tam itthim dvidhā chetvā attānam upphālesi

original: ‘ubho pecca bhavissāmā’ti.
analyzed: ubho pecca bhavissāma ati

original: Imināpi kho etaṁ, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyena veditabbaṁ yathā piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā”ti.
analyzed: iminā api kho eta brāhmaṇa pariyāyena veditabbam yathā piya jātikā soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: Atha kho nāḷijaṅgho brāhmaṇo bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā
analyzed: atha khalu nāḷijaṅghaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāya āsanā

original: yena mallikā devī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā yāvatako ahosi bhagavatā saddhiṁ kathāsallāpo
analyzed: yena mallikā devī tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā yāvatakaḥ ahosi bhagavatā saddhim kathā sallāpaḥ

original: taṁ sabbaṁ mallikāya deviyā ārocesi. Atha kho mallikā devī yena rājā pasenadi kosalo
analyzed: tam sabbam mallikāya deviyai ārocesi atha kho mallikā devī yena rājā pasenadi kosalo

original: tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā rājānaṁ pasenadiṁ kosalaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā rājānam pasenadim kosalam etat avoca

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi mahā rāja

original: piyā te vajirī kumārī”ti?
analyzed: piyā te vajirī kumārī iti

original: “Evaṁ, mallike, piyā me vajirī kumārī”ti.
analyzed: eva mallike piyā me vajirī kumārī iti

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi mahā rāja

original: vajiriyā te kumāriyā vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṁ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
analyzed: vajiriyā te kumāriyāḥ vipariṇāma aññathābhāvā uppajjeyyum soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā ati

original: “Vajiriyā me, mallike, kumāriyā vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṁ, kiṁ pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
analyzed: vajiriyāḥ me mallike kumāriyāḥ vipariṇāma aññathābhāvā jīvitassa pi siyā aññathatta kim pana me na uppajjissanti soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā ti

original: “Idaṁ kho taṁ, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsitaṁ:
analyzed: idam kho ta mahā rāja tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsita

original: ‘piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā’ti.
analyzed: piya jātikā soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi mahā rāja

original: piyā te vāsabhā khattiyā”ti?
analyzed: piyā te vāsabhā khattiyā ati

original: “Evaṁ, mallike, piyā me vāsabhā khattiyā”ti.
analyzed: eva mallike piyā me vāsabhā khattiyā ati

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja, vāsabhāya te khattiyāya vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṁ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
analyzed: tam kim maññasi mahā rāja vāsabhāya te khattiyāya vipariṇāma aññathābhāvāḥ uppajjeyyum soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā ati

original: “Vāsabhāya me, mallike, khattiyāya vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṁ, kiṁ pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
analyzed: vāsabhāya me mallike khattiyāya vipariṇāma aññathābhāvā jīvitassa api siyā aññathatta kim pana me na uppajjissanti soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā ti

original: “Idaṁ kho taṁ, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsitaṁ:
analyzed: idam kho ta mahā rāja tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsita

original: ‘piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā’ti.
analyzed: piya jātikā soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja, piyo te viṭaṭūbho senāpatī”ti?
analyzed: tam kim maññasi mahā rāja piyaḥ te viṭaṭūbho senāpati iti

original: “Evaṁ, mallike, piyo me viṭaṭūbho senāpatī”ti.
analyzed: eva mallike piyaḥ me viṭaṭūbho senāpatiḥ iti

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja, viṭaṭūbhassa te senāpatissa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṁ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
analyzed: tam kim maññasi mahā rāja viṭaṭūbhassa te senāpatissa vipariṇāma aññathābhāvāḥ uppajjeyyum soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā ati

original: “Viṭaṭūbhassa me, mallike, senāpatissa vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṁ, kiṁ pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
analyzed: viṭaṭūbhassa me mallike senāpatissa vipariṇāma aññathābhāvā jīvitassa pi siyā aññathatta kim pana me na uppajjissanti soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā ti

original: “Idaṁ kho taṁ, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsitaṁ:
analyzed: idam kho ta mahā rāja tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsita

original: ‘piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā’ti.
analyzed: piya jātikā soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja, piyā te ahan”ti?
analyzed: tam kim maññasi mahā rāja piyā te ahanti

original: “Evaṁ, mallike, piyā mesi tvan”ti.
analyzed: eva mallike piyā mesi tvanti

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi mahā rāja

original: mayhaṁ te vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṁ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
analyzed: mayham te vipariṇāma aññathābhāvā uppajjeyyum soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā ati

original: “Tuyhañhi me, mallike, vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṁ, kiṁ pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
analyzed: tuyhan hi me mallike vipariṇāma aññathābhāvā jīvitassa pi siyā aññathatta kim pana me na uppajjissanti soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā ti

original: “Idaṁ kho taṁ, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsitaṁ:
analyzed: idam kho ta mahā rāja tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsita

original: ‘piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā’ti.
analyzed: piya jātikā soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi mahā rāja

original: piyā te kāsikosalā”ti?
analyzed: piyā te kāsikosalāti

original: “Evaṁ, mallike, piyā me kāsikosalā.
analyzed: eva mallike piyā me kāsi kosalā

original: Kāsikosalānaṁ, mallike, ānubhāvena kāsikacandanaṁ paccanubhoma, mālāgandhavilepanaṁ dhāremā”ti.
analyzed: mallike ānubhāvena kāsika candanam mālā gandha vilepanam dhārema ati

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi mahā rāja

original: kāsikosalānaṁ te vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā uppajjeyyuṁ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
analyzed: kāsi kosalānam te vipariṇāma aññathābhāvāḥ uppajjeyyum soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā ati

original: “Kāsikosalānañhi, mallike, vipariṇāmaññathābhāvā jīvitassapi siyā aññathattaṁ, kiṁ pana me na uppajjissanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti?
analyzed: kāsi kosalānam hi mallike vipariṇāma aññathābhāvā jīvitassa pi siyā aññathatta kim pana me na uppajjissanti soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā ti

original: “Idaṁ kho taṁ, mahārāja, tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsitaṁ:
analyzed: idam kho ta mahā rāja tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sandhāya bhāsita

original: ‘piyajātikā sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā piyappabhavikā’”ti.
analyzed: piya jātikā soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsā piya ppabhavikā ati

original: “Acchariyaṁ, mallike, abbhutaṁ, mallike.
analyzed: acchariya mallike abbhuta mallike

original: Yāvañca so bhagavā paññāya ativijjha maññe passati.
analyzed: yāvañca so bhagavā paññāya ativijjha maññe passati

original: Ehi, mallike, ācamehī”ti.
analyzed: ehi mallike ācama ihi iti

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā tikkhattuṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā yena bhagavā tena añjalim paṇāmetvā tikkhattum udānam udānesi

original: “Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti.

original: Piyajātikasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ sattamaṁ.
